name: ZenithAssistant
0:
”Alexa open zenith assistant”
”Alexa open zenith assistant and check whats new”
”Alexa ask zenith assistant to read my new feeds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zenith assistant
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Zenith Assistant, is an alexa skill linked with your zenithtest.teamhealth.com account and can run on almost any Alexa Device.

This skill provide zenithtest.teamhealth.com users ability to check and read the followings
* Company news feeds
* Personal mails
* Department & location specific updates

HOW TO USE

Read Commands:
1. Alexa open zenith assistant and check whats new
2. Alexa ask zenith assistant to read my new feeds
3. Alexa ask zenith assistant to read my new mails

NOTE: This skill requires you to link your zenithtest.teamhealth.com account, When you use it for the first time, a link will be send to your Alexa App and you need to click and authenticate it.
